name: Shotz
description:
This is a fast pace shooting first person game. You take control of a bean who is supposed to prove that beans can be good graphic objects for player. Try your best to prove it and survive as long as possible.

Its various features are listed below:

  • three different enemies with different abilities
  • 5+ weapons
  • wall run
  • random enemy and weapon spawn

This game has three enemies

  • Walker - these has the lowest kill point and is the easiest one to kill
  • Static - these are not able to move but can be challenging to kill
  • Hover - these are found hovering in air. They can shoot towards player from unexpected angles.

This game is endless, as you kill enemies the new ones gets instantiated and after  fix intervals of time different weapons also get instantiated anywhere on the map. This interval of time increases as you progress in the game.

Controls:-

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • left shift to sprint
  • e to pick up weapon
  • q to throw weapon
  • left mouse click to shoot
  • jump and run beside the wall for wall run
